rulesStrings.li: questDescription->High command of [asker_faction_name] lost contact with one of their Kodiak shuttles performing a routine scouting mission near [map_definite]. They are particularly interested in the data from the shuttle black box, which will be automatically uploaded once you get in range. /n[asker_faction_name] has no personnel they can spare to launch a rescue operation. As such, if there are any survivors, they can choose freely to return with you to [map_definite]. /nCrash might have attracted the attention of hostiles.
